summary: Desvelan que la cicatriz de Harry Potter no es un rayo y los fans se quedan boquiabiertos
title: Desvelan que la cicatriz de Harry Potter no es un rayo y los fans se quedan boquiabiertos
body:
12 años después de la publicación del último libro de Harry Potter, cabría esperar que los fans del mago ya lo supiesen todo sobre él. ¡Pero no es así!

Y es que multitud de Potterheads se han visto sorprendidos por la revelación de que la icónica cicatriz que Harry tiene en su frente no representa un rayo eléctrico –a pesar de tener exactamente esa forma. La explicación nos remite al Avada Kedavra, la “maldición asesina” que causa una muerte instantánea.

Cuando Harry era bebé en 1981, Lord Voldemort invadió la casa de los Potters en Godric´s Hollow y asesinó a su padre, James. A continuación, Voldemort mató a la madre de Harry, Lily, quien sacrificó su vida para salvar al pequeño.

El Señor Oscuro trató de emplear el Avada Kedavra sobre Harry, pero el sacrificio de Lily hizo que el hechizo fallase, dejando a Harry indemne salvo por la cicatriz de su frente…

Did you know Harry Potter’s scar isn’t a lightning bolt, but actually the hand motion to cast Avada Kedavra pic.twitter.com/B8ig9dLGFg

— Today Years Old (@todayyearsoldig) 10 de enero de 2019

Pues bien, lo que un fan de Potter ha revelado en Twitter es que la razón por la que la cicatriz de Harry tiene la forma de un rayo eléctrico es que ese es precisamente el movimiento de manos que requiere el Avada Kedavra. ¿Cómo te quedas?

Las reacciones en Twitter no se han hecho esperar, y si hay un meme que ha triunfado como respuesta a la revelación, ese es sin duda el de “boquiabierto”:

pic.twitter.com/SfGcnnJAzP

— LesBeMums (@LesBeMums) 14 de enero de 2019

pic.twitter.com/99UQtRd1Kr

— the misfit💀 (@goodorgodd) 14 de enero de 2019

pic.twitter.com/X76GSwk58B

— Mabe ✨ (@mabe_rogers) 17 de enero de 2019

No obstante, recordemos que ahora estamos inmersos en la “Era Scamander” y que, tras el estreno de la secuela Los crímenes de Grindelwald en 2018, estamos muy pendientes del estreno de la tercera entrega de Animales fantásticos en 2020.


Para seguir leyendo:
Entrenan a un perro para obedecer… ¡a hechizos de Harry Potter!
Rupert Grint revela que solo puede ver tres películas de Harry Potter; hasta El Prisionero de Azkaban

Imágenes: ©Warner Bros. / Twitter

trail.content:
12 años después de la publicación del último libro de Harry Potter, cabría esperar que los fans del mago ya lo supiesen todo sobre él. ¡Pero no es así!

La famosa cicatriz de Harry Potter no representa un rayo: su explicación es mucho más arcana.

Y es que multitud de Potterheads se han visto sorprendidos por la revelación de que la icónica cicatriz que Harry tiene en su frente no representa un rayo eléctrico –a pesar de tener exactamente esa forma. La explicación nos remite al Avada Kedavra, la “maldición asesina” que causa una muerte instantánea.

Cuando Harry era bebé en 1981, Lord Voldemort invadió la casa de los Potters en Godric´s Hollow y asesinó a su padre, James. A continuación, Voldemort mató a la madre de Harry, Lily, quien sacrificó su vida para salvar al pequeño.

El Señor Oscuro trató de emplear el Avada Kedavra sobre Harry, pero el sacrificio de Lily hizo que el hechizo fallase, dejando a Harry indemne salvo por la cicatriz de su frente…

Did you know Harry Potter’s scar isn’t a lightning bolt, but actually the hand motion to cast Avada Kedavra pic.twitter.com/B8ig9dLGFg

— Today Years Old (@todayyearsoldig) 10 de enero de 2019

Pues bien, lo que un fan de Potter ha revelado en Twitter es que la razón por la que la cicatriz de Harry tiene la forma de un rayo eléctrico es que ese es precisamente el movimiento de manos que requiere el Avada Kedavra. ¿Cómo te quedas?

Las reacciones en Twitter no se han hecho esperar, y si hay un meme que ha triunfado como respuesta a la revelación, ese es sin duda el de “boquiabierto”:

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
magical Steve Irwin but 5x as chaotic
summary:
I was rewatching Fantastic Beasts, and can we just appreciate how much of a mess Newt Scamander truly is?
He was in the US for...
body:
I was rewatching Fantastic Beasts, and can we just appreciate how much of a mess Newt Scamander truly is?

He was in the US for 0.05 seconds before accidentally unleashing a handful of magical creatures to create chaos all over New York and subsequently revealing corruption in the government, finding the villain they’ve been searching years for, falling in love with his future wife, releasing a creature to its native land, building bridges between muggles and wizards while playing incidental matchmaker, and trying to save a child from abuse/depression who may be a D*mbledore no one’s heard of?

All within about 24 hours?

Inspirational.

blog.name: potionsandpatronuses
blog.title: potions and patronuses
blog.description:
"It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." - Albus Dumbledore       
- -                                                 
Avid lover of Harry Potter, obsessed with Remus Lupin and the Marauders. 
- -  
Feel free to request ships, imagines, send in asks, or just have a chat :)

body:
imagine requests

Hello my lovely followers! I hope you are all well!

I’ve been recently inspired to get back into writing and was wondering if you all might like to send in some imagine requests with your favourite Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts characters!

If you’ve requested a ship, I firstly thank you for doing so and second thank you for your patience. I will be posting them very soon!

Again, thank you for everything. I hope to hear from you soon xxx

blog.name: ao3feed-tomarrymort

blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: The Third Son
description:
by SweetBbyDragon

The Potters were blessed with three sons. This was very rare in magical society. As the three boys grow up, they are well loved and cared for. However, the third son soon learns of the truth of all living things. Death. After learning this truth, he sets out to master Death itself.
However, there is this annoying Riddle boy following him around.

Words: 5805, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: The Sacred 28 - Character, Potter - Character, The usual rag tag cast
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Euphemia Potter/Fleamont Potter, Charlus Potter/Dorea Black Potter
  • Additional Tags: AU, Tags added as we go along, very slow burn

blog.name: a-slytherin-in-autumn
blog.title: Slytherins aren't necesarrily evil
blog.description: I just hate denial. honestly in need of some slytherin friends where my sarcastic salts at?? marauders appreciation blog and overall hogwarts enthusiast

tags: I feel like this could be ravenclaw as well
title: being a slytherin like
body:
Even I myself can’t tell when I’m being sarcastic anymore. Just say everything in the same dry tone and someone will inevitably ask if you’re being sarcastic

like hunny I don’t even know what I just said means much less whether I meant it to be sarcastic or not

reblog.comment:

summary:
Things that irritate different houses and make them turn demonic suddenly:
Ravenclaw: when you disrespect their hobbies or...
body:
Things that irritate different houses and make them turn demonic suddenly:

Ravenclaw: when you disrespect their hobbies or damage a book

Hufflepuff: they are normally nice but if their friends get bullied you’re so dead

Slytherin : anything and everything

Gryffindor: when you hurt their friends or disrespect their cultures

blog.name: sassysumurai
blog.title: Ultimate Fangirl
blog.description: Just a random nerd you see on the streets

summary:
In the hair salon:
Gryffindor: I WANT THE LATEST TRENDS
Slytherin : A little too short and I'll cut your head off
Ravenclaw: As...
body:
In the hair salon:

Gryffindor: I WANT THE LATEST TRENDS

Slytherin : A little too short and I’ll cut your head off

Ravenclaw: As long as I’m comfortable when reading then I’m fine

Hufflepuff: We’ve been through thick and thin together, my dearest hair. I hate to see you go. Goodbye my love… (continues crying)

blog.name: shanastoryteller
blog.title: ShanaStoryteller
blog.description: Shana | 24 | Bi | Cis Lady | Atheist | California l Buy Gods & Monsters Buy Me a Coffee Me On AO3 Fandom Fic Gods&Monsters Retold Fairytales Haiku Project

summary: Merry Christmas! Ngawb or Good Omens please. Love your writing!
question: Merry Christmas! Ngawb or Good Omens please. Love your writing!
answer:
Neville finds some kind of irony in this, that he’s finally doing now what his gran wanted him to do as a kid. 

He’d been under strict orders to befriend the Malfoy heir, and failed miserably. 

Gran has always been keen on the Malfoys for reasons that Neville doesn’t understand, so she was thrilled when their families had heirs at the same time.  

But Draco had been an irritating little brat, so things hadn’t worked out as intended. These days, he’s still an irritating little brat, but they are friends, now. Finally.

summary: Hermione really could have been making out with star quidditch player Viktor Krum under the bleachers but Ron had to go and ruin...
body: Hermione really could have been making out with star quidditch player Viktor Krum under the bleachers but Ron had to go and ruin it for her. I’ll never forgive him.

summary: It'd be nice if they give us more opportunities to earn books (e. g. during lessons from time to time), not only in these...
body: It’d be nice if they give us more opportunities to earn books (e. g. during lessons from time to time), not only in these deadass long quests with maximum 7 red and 3 blue books rewards in each case, and you’re sitting and worrying if there is one more quest after the current one.

blog.name: vampyrewhore
blog.title: Yet to Be Impaled
blog.description: Vampire since 1114, Germanic origins, lived in England and Ireland most my life, but moved to the Americas in 1846. Spending the Internet Age making already melodramatic posts MORESO

summary: Master and and Madame Dursley, of the fourth house upon the Privet cobble, were prideful of the proclaim of truest worth, thy...
body: Master and and Madame Dursley, of the fourth house upon the Privet cobble, were prideful of the proclaim of truest worth, thy many graces. They were of the last thou may suspect to invoke either oddity or mystic, for they held strong grievances with such vices.

summary: Fred: The whole world of ear-related humour, and you go for 'holey'? George: Alright, then... Friends, Romans, countrymen- lend...
body:
Fred: The whole world of ear-related humour, and you go for ‘holey’?

George: Alright, then… Friends, Romans, countrymen- lend me your ears! Now my ear’s gone, you can see straight down by EAR-ie Canal! Do we have any of those Extendable Ears left? Mum, where’s the duct tape? Hey, did you guys EAR the one about–

Fred: OK, OK, you’re right, holey was better.

blog.name: rm-rpg
blog.title: repello muggletum
blog.description: Repello Muggletum is an upcoming wizarding city/town rpg loosely based on the HP world. If you've ever wanted to roleplay HP, but wanted a more chill atmosphere and plot, with the setting and focus on a town instead of Hogwarts or a Wizarding War, this might just be the place for you!

summary: "muggle-repelling charms on every inch of it. every time muggles have got anywhere near here all year, they've suddenly...
caption:
“muggle-repelling charms on every inch of it. every time muggles have got anywhere near here all year, they’ve suddenly remembered urgent appointments and had to dash away again.”

– arthur weasley 

repello muggletum is a city-town based rpg with the charm of harry potter! our fictional town is located between salem and boston in massachusetts, usa, set in the year 2019. read up on our plot & rules if you’re interested in joining in the future! <3 our planned opening is set for the 1st of february!
